automateChooseEffects.name: Auto roll for MidiQOL choose effects
automateChooseEffects.hint: Handles automatically selecting one of the MidiQOL (12.4.32+) choose effects options and applying it. To use, type in the Item`s requirements field: [autoMidiChooseEffects]

automateStatusesFlags.name: Add MidiQOL flags on statuses
automateStatusesFlags.hint: Handles addition of all suitable MidiQOL flags on system statuses and tries to automate specific ones like Charmed

automateHomebrewAdvancement.name: Automatic homebrew items advanvement
automateHomebrewAdvancement.hint: Handles automatically updating relevant items when actors level up or down
